Lemon Squeezy is a payment gateway for e: Lemon Squeezy是电子商务和基于订阅的企业的支付网关。
\nTo get your API Key:\n\n1. Go to your:
To get your API Key:

1. Go to your Lemon Squeezy dashboard
2. Navigate to Settings » API
3. Create a new API key
4. Copy the API key and paste it here
Triggers when a full or partial refund i: 按订单全额或部分退款时触发
Triggers when a new subscription is succ: 成功创建新订阅时触发
Triggers when a subscription's data is c: 当订阅的数据被更改或更新时触发
Triggers when a subscription is cancelle: 当客户或店主手动取消订阅时触发
Triggers when a subscription is resumed: 在先前被取消后恢复订阅时触发
Triggers when a subscription has ended a: 先前取消订阅后结束时触发
Triggers when a subscription's payment c: 当一个订阅的付款集合暂停时触发
在先前暂停后恢复订阅的付款收藏时触发
Triggers when a subscription renewal pay: 订阅续付款失败时触发
Triggers when a subscription has a succe: 当订阅在付款失败后有成功付款时触发
Triggers when a license key is created f: 从新订单创建许可证密钥时触发
Triggers when a license key is updated: 更新许可证密钥时触发
